content.rendered:
Aerospace & Defence

Aerospace & Defence

Pushing boundaries & defending horizons with cutting-edge technologies

NeST Digital partners with prime Global Aerospace OEMs bringing unmatched value to its customers and contributing to evolving modernization of aviation technologies.

We have expertise in vertically integrated supply chain solutions for various domains such as Design & Engineering, Manufacturing, Plastics, Metal, System Integration, Cable Harness, Software Services, and AM support.

Offerings

ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING Harnessing our expertise in aerospace hardware engineering, we provide a range of specialized services including board design, design analysis, and simulations. Our capabilities extend to RF & Microwave design, FPGA development, and optical and optoelectronic design. ATE & TEST ENGINEERING At our core, we prioritize strong processes and adherence to standards when it comes to test equipment design and development in the aerospace industry. Our expertise also extends to validation testing, test system design, and qualification testing. DIGITAL AVIATION - CORE COMPETENCE From cockpit electronics and proximity switch systems to missile electronics and underwater sensing, we deliver advanced solutions that elevate performance and ensure mission success.

Our expertise extends to SMFD and multi-function display integration, head-up display technology, fiber optic-based fly-by-light solutions, data acquisition systems, and thermal imaging and night vision capabilities. SOFTWARE ENGINEERING We provide complete lifecycle support for safety-critical onboard and ground systems in aerospace projects. Our expertise extends to developing high-quality Displays and Flight Data Monitoring (FDM) software.

With a focus on safety and reliability, our software solutions ensure seamless operation and accurate data representation for critical displays used in aircraft cockpits and ground control stations. MECHANICAL & STRUCTURAL ENGINEERING We offer comprehensive life cycle solutions encompassing CAD, CAE, reliability analysis, and documentation services. From conceptual design to development and beyond, our integrated approach ensures seamless collaboration, robust engineering analysis to deliver the right solution to clients!

Success Stories

FliSAFE – Flight Data Monitoring and Analysis Software: NeST Digital’s Solution to Enhance Flight Safety and Aircraft Health Monitoring

NeST Digital Develops a Multi-Function Display for Fighter Aircraft
